description: Defines data models for authentication requests and responses in the API layer.

classes.name: RegisterRequest
classes.description: Model representing the data required for user registration, including email, display name, and password.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Model representing the data required for user login, including email and password.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: Model representing the authentication response, containing message, access token, user details, and expiration timestamp.
